description.@en: There is never time to dwell on what lies in the dark if I remain consistently occupied. My work provides a haven from twisted thoughts and deep fears. Yet in those rare moments of quiet, it all comes unraveled.

effect.@en: Whenever you have committed to achieving a goal, you add +30% Base Chance to succeed at Toughness and Resolve Tests while doing it. However, you cannot succeed at Toughness and Resolve Tests when you are not working toward some end goal.
